definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms

sentences.english: The friendly relations between our two countries have been speeded to a new stage.
sentences.chinese: 我们两国之间的友好关系已经推进到了一个新阶段。

sentences.english: Japan abuts China, and the two countries have a consanguineous relationship in economy.
sentences.chinese: 日本与中国毗邻，且两国之间经济联系密切。

sentences.english: "Neighbors separated only by a strip of water." This expression has been employed for a long time to describe the diplomatic communication and the friendship between China and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 一衣带水一直被用来形容中日两国之间的邦交与友谊。

sentences.english: Cooperation between the two countries in the domain of fine art has also been greatly anticipated by many.
sentences.chinese: 可以说两国之间艺术上的合作也是众望所归。

sentences.english: The friendly intercourse between our two countries can be traced back to last century.
sentences.chinese: 我们两国之间的友好往来可以追溯到上个世纪。

sentences.english: The press saw the event as a straw in the wind that augured the resumption of diplomatic relations between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 报界把这件事看作是两国之间即将恢复邦交的预兆。

sentences.english: JAL between the two countries has a huge route network.
sentences.chinese: 日航在两国之间拥有庞大的航线网络。

sentences.english: The cooperation between our two countries is going well.
sentences.chinese: 中索两国之间的合作一向很好。

sentences.english: It's for the sake of China-French relations, he said.
sentences.chinese: “这是为了中法两国之间的关系”他说。

sentences.english: The river runs between the two counties.
sentences.chinese: 这条河在两国之间流过。

sentences.english: The US military base in Japan is an issue between the US and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 驻日美军基地是美日两国之间的问题。

sentences.english: There are still great possibilities for cooperation between our countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们两国之间仍然有着巨大的合作机会。

sentences.english: Musharraf said that both countries share very sound relations.
sentences.chinese: 穆沙拉夫说，巴中两国之间有着非常良好的关系。

sentences.english: Tension is building betweeen the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 两国之间的紧张情绪日益加剧。

sentences.english: Bilaterial relations of the two countries were once again addressed and boosted.
sentences.chinese: 两国之间的双边关系由此也再次得到了关注和提升。

sentences.english: This should not present an obstacle to the development of good relations between our two countries.
sentences.chinese: 这不应妨碍我们两国之间良好关系的发展。
